results.title: Pharmacokinetics and clinical effects of atenolol in therapy of hyperthyroidism.
results.text_hl: Pharmacokinetics and clinical effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in therapy of @DISEASE_Hyperthyroidism @DISEASE_MESH:D006980 @@@hyperthyroidism@@@.

citations.NLM: Geffner DL, Sladek J, Hershman JM. Pharmacokinetics and clinical effects of atenolol in therapy of hyperthyroidism. Drugs Exp Clin Res. 1990;16(4):167-73. PMID: 2076652
citations.BibTeX: @article{2076652, title={Pharmacokinetics and clinical effects of atenolol in therapy of hyperthyroidism.}, author={Geffner DL and Sladek J and Hershman JM}, journal={Drugs Exp Clin Res}, volume={16}, number={4}, pages={167-73}}

results.title: Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis.
results.text_hl: This report describes our experience with 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Crisis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013958 @@@thyrotoxic@@@ @DISEASE_Graves_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@Graves' disease@@@ who were prepared for thyroidectomy using only a long-acting orally administered beta-adrenergic blocking agent (@CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@); @CHEMICAL_Iodides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007454 @@@iodides@@@ were not used.

citations.NLM: Gerst PH, Fildes J, Baylor P, Zonszein J. Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis. Arch Surg. 1986 Jul;121(7):838-40. PMID: 2872875
citations.BibTeX: @article{2872875, title={Long-acting beta-adrenergic antagonists as preparation for surgery in thyrotoxicosis.}, author={Gerst PH and Fildes J and Baylor P and Zonszein J}, journal={Arch Surg}, volume={121}, number={7}, pages={838-40}}
